content.question: Which of the following groups of cellular components are found in eukaryotic cells but not prokaryotic cells?

choices.label: Circular chromosomes, mitochondria, and an endoplasmic reticulum
A nucleus, ribosomes, and cell walls
An endoplasmic reticulum, mitochondria, and a nucleus

content.answer: An endoplasmic reticulum, mitochondria, and a nucleus
